hf.name: Mr. Whiskers
hf.appearance: Tall, anthropomorphic rabbit with blue fur

tr.name: Mom
tr.appearance: Mid-thirties, tired eyes but warm smile

xc.name: Dr. Stephens
xc.appearance: Bald, with round glasses and a kind face

json_to_edit.voice_over: Sometimes, the line between imagination and reality blurs in the most unexpected ways.
json_to_edit.description: Emily's imaginary friend, Mr. Whiskers, suddenly becomes real during a therapy session.
json_to_edit.lighting: Soft, natural light from large windows
json_to_edit.name: Imaginary Friend's Surprise
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Emily's therapy session takes an unexpected turn when her imaginary friend materializes.

qa.action: Emily enters Dr. Stephens' office, clutching her backpack tightly.

hf.action: Dr. Stephens sits across from Emily, notepad in hand, as they begin their session.

tr.action: Emily's eyes light up as she describes Mr. Whiskers to Dr. Stephens.

xc.action: Suddenly, Mr. Whiskers appears next to Emily, startling both her and Dr. Stephens.

ka.action: Emily's mom rushes into the office, freezing at the sight of Mr. Whiskers.

fn.action: Mr. Whiskers smiles warmly at Emily, offering his paw as everyone stares in disbelief.

edit_command: Add two shots at the end and remove the first shot. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: Sometimes, the line between imagination and reality blurs in the most unexpected ways.
updated_json.description: Emily's imaginary friend, Mr. Whiskers, suddenly becomes real during a therapy session.
updated_json.lighting: Soft, natural light from large windows
updated_json.name: Imaginary Friend's Surprise
updated_json.scene_summary: Emily's therapy session takes an unexpected turn when her imaginary friend materializes.

hf.action: Dr. Stephens sits across from Emily, notepad in hand, as they begin their session.

tr.action: Emily's eyes light up as she describes Mr. Whiskers to Dr. Stephens.

xc.action: Suddenly, Mr. Whiskers appears next to Emily, startling both her and Dr. Stephens.

ka.action: Emily's mom rushes into the office, freezing at the sight of Mr. Whiskers.

fn.action: Mr. Whiskers smiles warmly at Emily, offering his paw as everyone stares in disbelief.

yz.action: Dr. Stephens adjusts his glasses, trying to maintain composure as he cautiously approaches Mr. Whiskers.

wx.action: The room falls silent as Mr. Whiskers playfully hops around, proving his tangible presence to all.

label.rationale:
we will update the json according to the edit command by removing the first shot and adding two new shots at the end. this will involve modifying the "shots" section of the json, including updating the "list_display_order" and adding new shot entries. we'll also need to update the "number_of_shots" field to reflect the new total. here's how we'll proceed:

1. remove the first shot (key "qa") from the shots dictionary and the list_display_order.
2. add two new shots at the end with creative descriptions that fit the scene.
3. update the list_display_order to reflect these changes.
4. update the "number_of_shots" field from "6" to "7".

the rest of the json will remain unchanged as per the instruction.

value.action: Dr. Stephens adjusts his glasses, trying to maintain composure as he cautiously approaches Mr. Whiskers.
The room falls silent as Mr. Whiskers playfully hops around, proving his tangible presence to all.
